name: C**ts You!
description:
You play as coots trying to kill all of the enemy mice. Your only attack is to jump of thing and push them as hard as you can. Use the yarn balls as your advatange by pushing them on the mice. Those yarn balls are really deadly... 

Submission for the Ludwig Jam 2023, made in 30 hours, mostly live on Twitch

Controls (Keyboard)

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move
  • SHIFT to dash
  • SPACE (or LMB) to attack
  • ESC to pause

Controls (Gamepad)

  • Left Joystick to move
  • X to dash
  • A to attack
  • START to pause

When getting close to an object or enemy, you'll see an arrow appear. It's showing in which direction you'll push it if you attack. BE CAREFUL , attacking enemies (mice) directly will deal YOU damage too.

Credits
  • Code, Art, SFX done by me
  • Engine: Godot Engine 3.5.1
  • Font: Apache
  • Music: Ludum Dare 38 - Track 9 (Abstraction abstractionmusic.com)
Sources

https://github.com/MrEliptik/coots_you
